personal_info.summary: I am a +2 year experience Frontend Developer using React/NextJs with Typescript and Tailwind as main technologies. I like to work on innovative projects where I can collaborate with my knowledge, not only coding, but thinking proposes to do a better final product. I consider myself responsible and committed to every task assigned to me. Although I am reinforcing my NextJs knowledge with Udemy courses, my goal is to expand my skill set into Backend technologies like Node.js and Express to become a MERN FullStack Web Developer.

responsibilities: Leading the website store development for Tecsopel SA, a Stationery wholesaler, using Next.js 15 and Typescript.
Leading the products data structure to allow storing multiple prices depending on the order size.
Created a product search filter by URL params to allow the user to save and share them and a shopping cart to add multiple products to the order.
Contact form managed with Formspree free tool.
Consuming JSON file with products data as the backend is not developed yet.
Collaborated in the development of a healthcare job portal for NovaSalud using Next.js 14, Typescript, and Tailwind CSS.
Consumed API to manage asset data, CV, documents and collaborated hours, managed client data and workers search using React Query.
Developed forms using react-hook-form library to manage input values and errors.
Managed application global state using React Context.
Integrated secure user authentication with Auth0.
Created a UI component library using Storybook.
Collaborated in the development of AIForce app, a file management application incorporating an AI Chat interface.
Developed a reusable UI component library with Storybook.
Consumed API using the Axios library to perform CRUD operations.
Implemented a versatile file viewer supporting diverse formats.
Employed React Context and Redux for global state management.
Developed front-end layouts for web applications for HLA Hospitals and Mitte clients using Next.js, Vite, and Typescript.
Handled date manipulation and formatting with Day.js, implemented styling with styled-components, and created forms with react-hook-form.
Utilized GSAP for UI animations and implemented charts using React Charts.
Developed a file management feature within a mobile application for CBRE using React Native.
